nodes.text: Nuen, known as Honest Nuen to his customers, was a male Human who worked as a speeder merchant during the Galactic War between the Galactic Republic and the Sith Empire. During the war, he operated a stall in the Alien Enclave Market of the city Voss-Ka on the planet Voss.

Nuen first appeared in Star Wars: The Old Republic, an MMORPG released by BioWare in 2011. In the game he serves as a Republic and Imperial heavy armor vendor on the planet Voss. His location is also marked on a map in Prima Games' Star Wars: The Old Republic Explorer's Guide.
